solution_line_template: The zoo has {visitors_per_hour} * {hours_open} = <<{visitors_per_hour}*{hours_open}={total_visitors}>>{total_visitors} visitors in one day

The number of visitors that go to the gorilla exhibit in one day is {total_visitors} * {gorilla_exhibit_percent} = <<{total_visitors}*{gorilla_exhibit_percent}={gorilla_visitors}>>{gorilla_visitors} visitors
